parsed.iteration_assessment: The first iteration made a significant push towards improving test coverage, earning praise for adding meaningful reliability improvements. Red team testing showed partial success but highlighted weaknesses in thoroughness and depth of changes, suggesting limited scope exploration and undercoverage of edge cases.

next_iteration_seeds.title: Improve security posture
next_iteration_seeds.rationale: Given the partial success from red team and lack of historical focus on security, introducing mechanisms for more comprehensive threat modeling will address weaknesses in robustness.

next_iteration_seeds.title: Enhance user experience and command-line interface
next_iteration_seeds.rationale: User experience was not a primary axis but can significantly impact value. Addressing common UX issues and ensuring a smooth CLI interaction enhances utility.
